meta.content: Here, you will find manuals, handbooks, policies, procedures, plans, and other informational documents for Venus Independent School District. All non-financial state and federally mandated...

div.font: Here, you will find manuals, handbooks, policies, procedures, plans, and other informational documents for Venus Independent School District. All non-financial state and federally mandated information disclosures and postings are located on this web page.

div.em: Venus ISD serves over two thousand students and is located 25 miles south of the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex. Once a rural farming area, Venus has grown into a small suburban community. The Venus Independent School District has been committed to providing excellence in education for its students since it was founded in 1914.
